title: Your Paper Title Here
abstract: A brief summary of your paper. This appears in listing views and at the top of the paper detail page. Keep it concise but informative - 2-3 sentences explaining what the paper is about and its key findings.
content:
# Main Content

This is where the full content of your paper goes. You can write a detailed explanation here.

## Introduction

Provide background and context for your research.

## Methodology

Explain your approach and methods.

## Results

Discuss your findings and their implications.

## Conclusion

Summarize your work and potential future directions.
